VBDM module¶

Vector Borne Disease Model Class.

Contains class for specific diseases that inherit from the class VectorBorneDiseaseModel. Also contains methods to read in root configuration file and instantiate loggers.

Typical usage example:

logger = VBDM.create_logger(logger_name, config_file_name) disease = VBDM.DengueSEIRModel(config_file_name, simulation_duration)

class VBDM.DengueSEIRModel(config_file, days)¶

Bases: VBDM.VectorBorneDiseaseModel

Models the spread of dengue.

Inherits from the VectorBorneDiseaseModel class. Solves ODE system of equations and plots the resulting curves.

graph_model()¶

Plots output of dengue model

run_model()¶

Runs ODE solver to generate model output

class VBDM.VectorBorneDiseaseModel(config_file, config_name, days)¶

Bases: object

Defines a general vector borne disease model.

Reads root config file and sets parameters.

Attributes:

params: ODE system parameters. initial_states: initial states for population sizes.

class VBDM.WNVSEIRModel(config_file, days)¶

Bases: VBDM.VectorBorneDiseaseModel

Models the spread of WNV.

Inherits from the VectorBorneDiseaseModel class. Solves ODE system of equations and plots the resulting curves.

graph_model()¶

Plots output of WNV model

run_model()¶

Runs ODE solver to generate model output

VBDM.create_arg_parser()¶

Configures command line argument parser.

Checks if the argument is a valid file.

Returns:

parser object.

VBDM.create_logger(name, config_file)¶

Configures and instantiates logger object.

Creates logger that prints DEBUG statements and more serious statements to log files. Prints ERROR statements to console.

Args:

name: Name of logger to be created. Typically module name. String. config_file: Absolute path to root config file. String.

Returns:

logging object.
